plot outline: In today's urban Indian lifestyle where more relationships seem idealistic and flawless, an archaeologist encounters his look alike and the disturbing past of the look alike's aging mother in rural Maharashtra. But was his father responsible for the plight of this old woman. The film is an emotional story of a romance failed by a cruel twist of fate, a confrontation of shattered family values and rebuilding of human bonds.
title: Pitruroon

Venkatesh's father passes away at his rituals the grow decides not to touch his Pind.As soon as he prays that he will fulfill his father's last wish the crow touches the Pind. On work purpose he travels a to village where his daughter Devyani sees his lookalike Sangitappa.Bhagirathi Aaji mother of Sangitaappa opens up to Venkatesh about her life story and ask's him to figure out the last wish of his father.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
